wiki.summary: After a tragic 2018 overdose, Lovato returns to the spotlight with this powerful and heart-wrenching song. Released only moments before the pop superstar performed it at the 62nd Annual Grammy Awards, "Anyone" is a song that was meant to be a call for help. Demi recorded the song only 4 days prior to their overdose in July of 2018 in Los Angeles, California. "Anyone" peaked at #34 on the Billboard Hot 100 in January 2020. This song also gave Lovato their first #1 single on the weekly Billboard Digital Singles Sales Chart Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: After a tragic 2018 overdose, Lovato returns to the spotlight with this powerful and heart-wrenching song. Released only moments before the pop superstar performed it at the 62nd Annual Grammy Awards, "Anyone" is a song that was meant to be a call for help. Demi recorded the song only 4 days prior to their overdose in July of 2018 in Los Angeles, California. "Anyone" peaked at #34 on the Billboard Hot 100 in January 2020. This song also gave Lovato their first #1 single on the weekly Billboard Digital Singles Sales Chart, with this Demi had one of the best selling solo female single of 2020. It was later Included as the opening track of their seventh studio album Dancing With The Devil…The Art of Starting Over. “‘Anyone’ was the first song I shared with the world in regards to what I’ve been going through the past couple years. I feel like it was really the catalyst of the new beginning of this journey, so it was the perfect song to open the album right out of the gate. The rest of the project goes through my story and my journey, so you see where it ends up when you listen to the full thing.” -- Demi Lovato Read more on Last.fm.
